entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11 except minus 17 inland.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11 except minus 17 inland. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16 except minus 10 along the coast.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16 except minus 10 along the coast. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023
